## PointTechniqueParams interface

Possible parameters of \[\[PointTechnique\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PointTechniqueParams extends BaseTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color](./harp-datasource-protocol.pointtechniqueparams.color.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Color of a point in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [enablePicking](./harp-datasource-protocol.pointtechniqueparams.enablepicking.md) | boolean | Whether to enable picking on these points. |
|  [opacity](./harp-datasource-protocol.pointtechniqueparams.opacity.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | For transparent lines, set a value between 0.0 for totally transparent, to 1.0 for totally opaque. |
|  [size](./harp-datasource-protocol.pointtechniqueparams.size.md) | number | Size of point in pixels. |
|  [texture](./harp-datasource-protocol.pointtechniqueparams.texture.md) | string | URL of a texture image to be loaded. |
|  [transparent](./harp-datasource-protocol.pointtechniqueparams.transparent.md) | boolean | Set to <code>true</code> if line should appear transparent. Rendering transparent lines may come with a slight performance impact. |
